articles.title: US ends Johnson & Johnson vaccine pause - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Food and Drug Administration has amended the emergency use authorization for the vaccine to include mention of the clotting issue.
articles.content:
Federal health officials said late Friday that vaccinations with Johnson & Johnson's coronavirus vaccine can restart, ending a 10-day pause over a potential link to rare and severe blood clots.
